name: Dam, what a life!
description: This is Dam, what a life! an idle/strategy game where you control a poor beaver who just finished building his first dam and it gets destroyed, time and time again, so help him rebuild it, upgrade it and evolve it into the best dam ever by buying upgrades on the shop and repairing your dam which is getting hit over and over again by enemies completely out of your reach. Have fun :smile:
